Hey, lets all be nice to each other. Gender mistakes are common, no need to yell.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Airly, Barrymore is a SHE! Maybe you should look at the character pages. McGowan is female. Barrymore is female. Alba is female. Stiller is male. Lee is male. Depp is male. Got it now?rvice.
